title: Google picks the best Android apps and games of 2022 – download them now

title: Texting is 30, which means most adults don't remember life before it
description: The first SMS text, 'Merry Christmas.', was sent 30 years ago.

title: AMD RDNA 3 GPUs could be hard to buy when they’re launched
description: Speculation is swirling about the RX 7900 XT and XTX, and what we’re hearing is pretty ominous.

title: AWS sets its sights on space for the future of cloud capabilities
description: Cloud capabilities can push forward advances in space and back on terra firma, AWS head believes.

title: Apple's latest accessibility video is one of its best, but it also gives me hope for VR
description: To mark International Day of Disabled Persons, Apple released a video showing some accessibility features in real-world use.

title: Disney’s incredible new re-aging tech could turn back time on more Hollywood heroes
description: Disney has lifted the lid on some potentially groundbreaking digital re-aging technology.

title: New supercharged AMD Ryzen 7000 CPUs could be imminent
description: A new rumor dump presents some quite different possibilities to other recent speculation, that’s for sure.

title: Pro-Ject's super-stylish white turntable takes me back to days of the classic iPod
description: Austrian audio company marks 30th anniversary with limited-edition snow-white version of its Debut PRO record player.

title: Realme GT 3: what we want to see
description: The Realme GT 3 could land soon as an affordable alternative to a flagship. Here's what we know about it and what we want.
